title: The Federal Government will also forge even closer links between the issues of Section governance, fragility and conflict, and systematically support the capabilities of 3.2.1 governments to implement the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development

The Federal Government is striving to further expand administrative reforms, Section decentralisation, local governance and the fight against corruption in line with 3.2.5 implementing the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development
The Federal Government is working for the advancement of the Common Security Section and Defence Policy
As the central interface to non-governmental actors, the Federal Government will Section further consolidate and strengthen the Advisory Board for Civilian Crisis Prevention
